alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:19PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lander County through 445 PM PDT... At 418 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles west of Grass Valley, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
